doc.title: Live and Let Ride
doc.plot: Live and Let Ride is a documentary all about girls that skateboard. Through skateboarding footage, interviews and music the documentary portrays the girls that are out there skating everyday yet remain largely ignored by the media and sports world...includes interviews and skating of Cara-Beth Burnside, Jen O'Brien, Jesse Van Roechoudt, Jodi McDonald, Patty Segovia and covers events such as the All Girl Skate Jam and The Juice Magazine Five and Alive at Riverside Park in NYC. The video also looks at Rookie Skateboards, the all girl-owned skateboard company based in Chinatown, NYC.
